name: MLB 9 Innings Rivals
description:
A new officially licensed MLB mobile game with the latest rosters and schedules!
Enjoy an MLB mobile game with improved graphics!
Dive into MLB 9 INNINGS RIVALS for a brand new gameplay experience.

■ GAME FEATURES
[Authentic]
Implemented the rosters of all 30 Major League Baseball teams and the season schedule of 2023!
Check out the Live system that reflects actual MLB players’ stats!
Experience mobile Major League Baseball with improved graphics!
It's more realistic than ever! Motion captures of actual MLB player movements!

[Gameplay]
Features various game modes for you to enjoy!
Watch your epic moments again via the Replay system!
Advance in the Major League Baseball Postseason and become World Series champions!
Experience the world of baseball as you continue to play!

[Simple]
Play whenever and wherever you want with enhanced accessibility.
Switch between Quick Play, Highlight Play, and Full Play for flexible gameplay!
Play with one hand in portrait mode as well as in landscape mode for the best gameplay experience!
Enjoy a realistic, thrilling Major League Baseball game at your convenience.

Device App Access Permission Notice

Access permissions are requested in order for us to provide you with the following service when you use the app.

[Required]

None

[Optional]
· Push Notification: The authority is required to receive push notifications from the game.
· Camera: When registering a profile image in the game, you need to "Allow" the camera to take pictures.
· Photos: "Allow" is required to upload in-game profile images from Photos.
· ID for Advertisers: It will help us to provide you a more personalized experience, relevant content, and ads.

※ Please note that you can still enjoy the service excluding features related to the above without giving access permissions.

[How to remove access permissions]
You can always change access permission settings whenever you'd like.

- Device Settings> Select the corresponding app> Choose either to enable/disable access
